translation.en: What are you doing, huh?
My body's been on fire.
Oh, is that so? [giggles]
Come here, then.
-Oh. -Oh, Mr. Castle. [laughs]
What did we do? We didn't do it!
I'm so sorry.
Oh, my God, of all the childish, immature things, Tega.
translation.ja: 年甲斐もないことするからよ テガ

translation.en: Look at this mess.
-[laughing] I'm sorry. -It's not funny.
-I'm sorry! -It's not funny.
Stella.
-What? -Oh, uh, everyone is waiting for you both.
translation.ja: 何？ みんなお待ちかねですよ

translation.en: Okay, um, we'll be right there.
-Okay. You okay? -Okay, yeah.
I'm good, baby, I'm good.
We can't go out there looking like we just made love.
-Almost made love, please. -Tega.
Look, there's a time and place for spontaneity.
translation.ja: 時と場所をわきまえて

translation.en: This is not it. Not here.
-All right. -Okay?
-Okay. -All right.
-We're good? -Yeah, I'm good.
translation.ja: 完璧？ ええ 私の服は？

translation.en: I think you look all right. What about me? Do I look all right?
-You're good, you're good. -You sure?
-You. You! -You. You.
You!
Thank you all. Thank you all so much.
translation.ja: みんな ありがとう

translation.en: But you really should be saving your claps for Mike
translation.ja: 拍手は主役のマイクに

translation.en: because he did an exceptional job on the M & G case.
translation.ja: Ｍ＆Ｇの件は本当によくやってくれた

translation.en: It's not every day that a firm like ours goes up against a Goliath
translation.ja: うちの事務所にとっては快挙よ

translation.en: like Adelegan & Partners and actually manages to secure
translation.ja: 超大手のアデレガンを相手取って

translation.en: a 200-million-naira settlement for our client.
translation.ja: ２億ナイラも勝ち取るなんてね

translation.en: I don't need to tell you all how that translates into billable hours for our firm.
translation.ja: おかげで今後は時間制報酬にできるわ

translation.en: And it's all due to this great talent, Mike, our lawyer.
translation.ja: それもこれも敏腕弁護士マイクのお手柄よ

translation.en: Now let's raise our glasses...
translation.ja: じゃあ グラスを上げて

translation.en: And our salaries we hope.
Well, you win the big cases like Mike does and you'll get a raise three times a year.
translation.ja: 大型案件で連勝すれば年に３回 上げる

translation.en: Really?
Yes, in your dreams.
-To Mike. -[all] To Mike!
Cheers.
Cheers.
Speech! Speech!
Uh-uh. Who died and made you town crier?
Speech. Stop being modest.
Well, first of all, I'd like to say thank you to everyone.
translation.ja: まず全員にお礼を言いたい

translation.en: Uh, when I first came into this law firm some seven years ago,
translation.ja: ロースクールを出てここに来たのは７年前

translation.en: I was fresh out of law school and wanted nothing more than to work under the legendary legal mind of Professor Castle
translation.ja: 伝説のキャッスル教授の下で働けるなんて夢のようだった

translation.en: and his incredible wife,
translation.ja: 奥様であるレミ･キャッスル弁護士も

translation.en: our dearly beloved senior advocate of Nigeria, Remi Castle.
translation.ja: 奥様であるレミ･キャッスル弁護士も 憧れの存在だった

translation.en: First thing Prof and Advocate Castle told me was that this was more than a law firm.
translation.ja: お二人が言ったようにうちは ただの会社じゃない

translation.en: -It was family. -[Tega] True.
And family sticks together always, sticks together no matter what.
translation.ja: 家族として どんな時も互いに支え合ってきた

translation.en: Now the only reason we were able to mop the floor with Adelegan Associates
translation.ja: アデレガンを打ち負かすことができたのは

translation.en: is because I had the inextricable help of everyone in this room.
translation.ja: 全員の相即不離のサポートがあったからだ

translation.en: "Inextra"-- What?
Inextricable. It means inseparable.
translation.ja: 不離　切り離せないってこと

translation.en: Mr. Monday, who asked you?
[Mr. Monday] Ungrateful cretin.
In conclusion, I would like to say this victory belongs to every one of us.
translation.ja: 今回の勝利はみんなで勝ち得たものだ

translation.en: And as my people like to say, the broom is much harder to break when it's bunched up together.
translation.ja: “三本の矢”のように力を合わせれば無敵だ

translation.en: -Hear, hear! -So to all of us.
-To all of us! -[Remi] Yes! To Mike.
Now we celebrate.
-[cheering] -Ah, wait, wait!
Hold on, hold on. Moderately though, moderately.
translation.ja: くれぐれも飲みすぎるなよ

translation.en: Because I don't want to hear stories of hangover tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 二日酔いの顔を見たくない

translation.en: And especially you, Captain.
Me? Hundred percent no hangover, sir.
translation.ja: 私？　心配はご無用です

translation.en: It seems that someone neglected to inform me about today's celebrations, I suppose.
translation.ja: せっかくのパーティーに私を招待し忘れるとはな

translation.en: [Remi] Oh, no, sorry, Daddy. It's just a small office thing. But how did you find out about it anyway?
translation.ja: パパ ごめんなさい誰から聞いたの？

translation.en: It is my business to know things, my dear, eh?
translation.ja: 情報収集も仕事のうちだ

translation.en: Especially defeating the oldest and most influential law firm in Lagos
translation.ja: ラゴスで最も歴史と影響力のある企業と争って

translation.en: in a 200-million-naira litigation.
translation.ja: ２億を勝ち取るとは大したもんだ

translation.en: -It's a big deal. -It's a big deal, yes.
translation.ja: ２億を勝ち取るとは大したもんだ 偉業よ

translation.en: The entire Lagos legal fraternity is talking about it.
translation.ja: 法曹界で話題の的になってるぞ

translation.en: As they should.
[in Yoruba] Aha! Excuse me.
-You must be the man of the moment, abi? -Greetings, Chief.
translation.ja: 今日の主役だな どうも

translation.en: It is lawyers like you who assure me that my investment is secure.
translation.ja: 君のような人財がいれば投資の元が取れるな

translation.en: Congratulations. And why is the young man not yet a partner in the firm?
translation.ja: おめでとう 彼をパートナー弁護士にしなさい

translation.en: Well, with all due respect, only partners can decide who makes partner.
translation.ja: 失礼ですが決定権は私たちに

translation.en: Well, maybe, but you forget whose name is on the building.
translation.ja: このビルに誰の名前がついてるか忘れたか

translation.en: Or you forget whose name is on the firm.
translation.ja: この事務所には誰の名が？

translation.en: -Really? Look-- -This is Castle--
translation.ja: 何だと キャッスルだ

translation.en: Tega, please. Not now, not here.
translation.ja: テガ 人前でやめてよ

translation.en: -Please. -I'll be in my office.
Really?
Well, left to him,
this firm will be providing pro bono services to every disgruntled houseboy in Lagos.
translation.ja: ラゴス中の下男のグチを無料相談(プロボノ)で聞くハメになるぞ

translation.en: Don't be ridiculous, Daddy.
Look, you did not become a senior advocate of Nigeria
translation.ja: 奉仕活動するために シニア･アドボケイト(ＳＡＮ)になったのか？

translation.en: just to squander your services free.
translation.ja: シニア･アドボケイト(ＳＡＮ)になったのか？

translation.en: Neither did Tega.
He is not a senior advocate. He's not even a professor, a real professor. No.
translation.ja: あの男はＳＡＮでも実際の教授でもない

translation.en: Daddy, what-- Come, let me get you a drink.
Please, what would you like? Do you want Rémy Martin or champagne--
translation.ja: 何がいい　マティーニ？

translation.en: You do recognize that things are about to change for Castle & Castle?
translation.ja: キャッスル＆キャッスルは次の段階に進もうとしてる

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Do you know that? -Yes, I know.
And your client base is also now going to include
translation.ja: 国で最大の資金力と影響力を誇る企業が

translation.en: the richest and most powerful corporations in the country.
translation.ja: 国で最大の資金力と影響力を誇る企業が 顧客になるんだ

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] You know that? -Yes, Daddy. I know, okay.
Now that we've agreed on that, what would you like to drink?
translation.ja: そのとおりよ　何飲む？

translation.en: Want some champagne? -Yes. -Let me pour you. This is a clean glass.
translation.ja: シャンパンでいいかしら

translation.en: [woman] I'm running a little bit late, so please don't let Chisara stay up too late watching cartoons.
translation.ja: 今夜は遅くなるチザラを早く寝かせてね

translation.en: Love you.
Hey, Nneka.
I couldn't help but notice how impressed you were with Mike.
translation.ja: さっきはマイクに関心してたね

translation.en: -Oh, but he's impressive. -Mmm.
Um, what would you say if I told you that I could have closed that case during the first court hearing?
translation.ja: 私が担当してたら初公判で勝訴してたがな

translation.en: Mr. Monday, are you saying that you could've done a better job?
Precisely.
But you're not a lawyer.
Oh, do you have to be a footballer to understand football?
translation.ja: サッカー選手でなくてもサッカーは分かる

translation.en: It's not that simple.
Oh, who says? Look, I spend more time in the filing room than any of you.
translation.ja: 君らの誰よりも長く資料室にいるんだぞ

translation.en: And I have read enough journals to qualify as a SAN myself.
translation.ja: ＳＡＮの資格を取るため関連誌も読み込んでる

translation.en: -A SAN? -Yeah.
Look, I can prove it to you.
-You see, in 1978-- -[clears throat] Mr. Monday.
translation.ja: 証明しよう　1978年には… マンデイさん資料室がめちゃくちゃよ

translation.en: Have you seen the disaster that happened in the filing room?
translation.ja: マンデイさん資料室がめちゃくちゃよ

translation.en: -What disaster? -All the shelves have collapsed.
translation.ja: 何だって 棚が倒れてる

translation.en: It's a lie.
Hey, you don't have to take my word for it, but I suggest you go and check it out yourself.
translation.ja: 疑うなら自分の目で確かめたら？

translation.en: Nah, nah, nah. That cannot be possible.
Mmm, stand here and be saying nah, nah, nah. When Professor is looking for a file and he can't find it,
translation.ja: 教授が資料を必死に探してる時に―

translation.en: you will know because you didn't do anything about the shelves.
translation.ja: 事実だと気づいても遅いわよ

translation.en: -Stella. -Hmm? Thank you, but you didn't have to lie.
translation.ja: ありがと嘘までついてくれて

translation.en: First of all, you're welcome.
Second of all-- [clears throat] I didn't lie. The shelves have collapsed.
translation.ja: ちなみに嘘じゃない棚が倒れてるのは本当

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Oh, my God.
Hurricane Katrina.
What happened?
Stella, now, tell me.
Well, it seems that Prof and Remi were, um--
translation.ja: 何ていうか教授とレミさんが…

translation.en: [clears throat] How do I say it? Obeying the instructions from Genesis chapter 1, verse 28.
translation.ja: 創世記 第１章28節の教えを実践してたの

translation.en: What instructions?
"Be fruitful and multiply."
What?
They were...
It's not me that told you.
You know, I really should've volunteered to be lead counsel on that M & G case.
translation.ja: Ｍ＆Ｇの件俺がやればよかった

translation.en: Labor law is not your strong point. Besides, you're not as good as Mike.
translation.ja: 労働法は門外だしマイクには負ける

translation.en: Ouch. [in Pidgin] Guy, haven't you ever heard of having sympathy for a brother?
translation.ja: キツいな　少しは同情しろよ

translation.en: You want sympathy?
Go get a room at LUTH.
You know, Maliq, sometimes, just sometimes,
translation.ja: マリーク  時には友人の気持ちを察してオブラートに包め

translation.en: you can try and sugarcoat your opinions so that at least you seem slightly friendly.
translation.ja: 時には友人の気持ちを察してオブラートに包め

translation.en: I don't need friends.
Hey.
Uh, Maliq.
So, uh, I noticed you haven't touched your drink.
translation.ja: さっきから全然 飲んでないわね

translation.en: Really?
Nope, he's just been holding onto it all night.
translation.ja: ええ グラスは満タンのまま

translation.en: -What's that about? -I don't drink.
Then why are you putting on a show?
It's easier than having to explain.
Cool.
But you also know that's kind of creepy.
It's Maliq. Middle name: Creep.
translation.ja: 変人マリークだからな

translation.en: Tired already, old man?
Mrs. Castle.
Yes, Mr. Castle.
Whatcha doin'?
Working?
Hey, you.
Your dad might have the key.
I already locked the door.
[sighs] He just might really come in
-with his spare key. -Look at you.
Here I am, horny as hell, and all you want to talk about is my dad.
translation.ja: 私がその気なのに父の話を続ける？

translation.en: I see that victory makes you horny, right?
translation.ja: その気なのは勝訴したから？

translation.en: You know this. I love victory.
[moans] Mr. Castle.
Hey, you're not gonna help me?
Oh, no. My work is done here.
-See you. -Mrs. Castle!
You like it, Mr. Castle, don't you?
translation.ja: こういうの好きでしょ

translation.en: Hi, Prof.
Ah, sorry about the mess.
-Oh, yeah. -Must have been the wind.
Yeah. The wind.
Can I help?
Please.
Enjoy.
And what's the life of the party doing out here all by himself?
translation.ja: こんな所でひとりパーティー？

translation.en: Lawyers don't usually suck at parties. These ones? [scoffs]
translation.ja: 弁護士はパーティー好きだ

translation.en: Plus, I'm not out here alone, am I?
translation.ja: それと今は一人じゃない

translation.en: Listen, the firm is arranging a substantial bonus for you.
translation.ja: あなたには高額のボーナスを出すわ

translation.en: It's our way of saying thank you.
Oh, I thought partnership was in the cards.
translation.ja: それよりパートナー弁護士に

translation.en: [laughs] You wish.
Is it unreasonable for me to expect one, though?
translation.ja: 十分 貢献したでしょう

translation.en: I mean, after all the work I've done. You heard what your father said.
Out of the question.
You know how Tega feels about that.
Look, I'm not saying no. I'm just saying wait.
translation.ja: 今は無理って意味よもう少し待って

translation.en: For how long?
For as long as it takes.
Well, then I suppose now is a good time as any to break it to you.
translation.ja: そのスタンスなら伝えるしかない

translation.en: Break what?
I'm leaving the firm.
What?
-What do you mean? -I'm starting my own practice.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 開業するので

translation.en: Mike.
We've been good to you. I've been good to you.
translation.ja: 目をかけてあげたわよね

translation.en: Yes, we've all been good to each other. But it's not enough.
translation.ja: そうですが今の処遇には満足できない

translation.en: I am the best lawyer you have in this firm and you keep holding me back.
translation.ja: 一番優秀なのに足を引っ張られる

translation.en: No one is holding you back!
[chuckles] You two will never make anyone partner.
translation.ja: パートナーにしてくれない

translation.en: -And you know it. -No, Mike--
translation.ja: パートナーにしてくれない 違うの

translation.en: And all the pro bono work Prof is having us chase after.
translation.ja: 仕事はプロボノばかり

translation.en: -I just couldn't care less. -What pro bono work?
translation.ja: 限界だ なぜ みんなプロボノって言うの

translation.en: Why do I keep hearing about pro bono work?
translation.ja: なぜ みんなプロボノって言うの

translation.en: You don't even know?
-The Amina Junaidu case. -What Amina Junaidu case?
translation.ja: アミナの件 アミナって誰よ

translation.en: Go ask Prof.
Okay, fine I'll ask him. But you can't leave.
translation.ja: 聞くわ　でも辞めないで

translation.en: You said it yourself out there. We're family.
Listen, I'll make sure Prof doesn't give you any more of those pro bono cases, okay?
translation.ja: もうプロボノは任せないと約束するわ

translation.en: Remi, the point is, I'm wasted here.
translation.ja: 時間を無駄にしたくない

translation.en: Mike, who gave you a chance when you were just a young fresher coming out of law school?
translation.ja: 新人だったあなたに誰がチャンスをあげた？

translation.en: Who built you into the lawyer that you are today? And gave you the opportunities that you want to now take to stab us in the back?
translation.ja: 一人前に育てたのに恩をあだで返すつもり？

translation.en: That's the problem with this place.
With you, everything is personal.
A practice is predicated on objectivity and professionalism. This...
translation.ja: この事務所は客観性とプロ意識に欠ける

translation.en: This is a mom-and-pop shop.
My decision is a professional one. Don't make it personal.
translation.ja: 私はプロとして決断を下した

translation.en: Everyone is a person, Mike. So that makes it personal.
translation.ja: 人間なんだから感情が入るのは当然よ

translation.en: You'll get my resignation letter in the morning.
Don't do this.
Nike, give us a moment.
And final warning on the dress code.
translation.ja: 服の注意は これが最後よ

translation.en: Mike is leaving.
-What? -Yeah.
-How? -He just told me.
translation.ja: なぜ 自分の事務所を始めると

translation.en: He's resigning to go and start his own firm.
translation.ja: 自分の事務所を始めると

translation.en: Oh, that opportunistic son of a bitch.
No, no, no. Don't call him that.
He has a right to do what he wants.
Okay, wait a minute. Now I'm confused. Did you encourage him to do this?
translation.ja: あいつの肩を持つのか？

translation.en: Clearly, no. But you played your part.
translation.ja: 違うけど あなたのせいよ

translation.en: How? I don't follow.
Amina Junaidu.
I saw the file.
What is that? Another pro bono case?
I'm in contact with an NGO that is campaigning for her release,
translation.ja: ＮＧＯが彼女の解放に努めてるんだが

translation.en: but there's nothing set in stone yet.
So technically, that is not even an issue that has come up for discussion.
translation.ja: それとこれと何の関係が？

translation.en: Well, it is if that's one of the reasons Mike is resigning.
translation.ja: マイクの辞職理由なのよ

translation.en: Rems, that is absurd.
Mike should not throw this in my face like it's something to resign about.
translation.ja: あいつは私のせいにしたいだけだ

translation.en: He probably thought about this a very long time ago. Let him get out of here.
translation.ja: 前々から計画してたはずだ去る者は追うな

translation.en: -Good riddance. -Tega.
translation.ja: 前々から計画してたはずだ去る者は追うな テガ

translation.en: -This is Mike we're talking about. -Yes.
translation.ja: あのマイクよ 利己主義の裏切り者だろ

translation.en: He's an opportunistic prick.
translation.ja: 利己主義の裏切り者だろ

translation.en: -[sighs] -Let him get out.
You don't get it.
He's just trying to drive me crazy doing this.
He just doesn't get it!
I don't even know why we're even considering this.
There's so many other firms that can handle this Amina Junaidu case.
translation.ja: よそに任せればいいのに

translation.en: It's a human rights issue.
Okay? Last time I checked, it's still a domain of the law.
translation.ja: 内容的には司法の領域に含まれる

translation.en: But it's not a domain of this firm. We don't do pro bono.
translation.ja: うちはプロボノはやらない

translation.en: Oh, I do!
-Tega. -Yes, darling?
-Baby. -Yes, baby?
What is this really about, hmm?
A young girl.
A young Nigerian girl
translation.ja: 不当判決によって処刑されそうな少女を

translation.en: is about to be unlawfully put to death by a Nigerian court.
translation.ja: 不当判決によって処刑されそうな少女を 救おうとしてる

translation.en: And you look me in the eye and ask me what this is really about?
It's what I do.
Good morning. Welcome to Castle & Castle.
Bless you, my daughter.
I need an advocate.
-I need a lawyer. -[whispering] Lawyer.
An eloquent lawyer.
Okay, um, would that be just for you or for all three of you?
translation.ja: 依頼人はあなただけ？それとも３人？

translation.en: The kingdom of God has suffered a grave injustice!
translation.ja: 神の王国がひどく汚されてる

translation.en: Injustice!
We will not allow the violent...
to dishonor that which belongs to God!
translation.ja: 暴力や不敬は許されぬ

translation.en: -Belongs to God! -Amen.
Preach, pastor. Preach! Oh, oh!
The kingdom of God needs a lawyer--
translation.ja: 神の王国に弁護者を遣わせたまえ

translation.en: -A lawyer! [exclaims] -to correct... that...
translation.ja: 神の王国に弁護者を遣わせたまえ 正すのだ

translation.en: which has been done to the kingdom.
Grievous.
-We need to change the narrative. -Yes, we do. Change.
translation.ja: 次のやつを はい　語り口を変更

translation.en: The children of God need a lawyer.
-A lawyer! -We do.
-I feel it in my soul. -Hah!
Sorry, the board room is busy at the moment, but if you can just sit over there,
translation.ja: 今は部屋が埋まっているのであちらでお待ちください

translation.en: I will get someone to attend to you shortly.
translation.ja: 担当者がご案内します

translation.en: Just over there on that couch.
-We sit? -Someone will attend to you shortly.
-Thank you. -[Stella] Yes.
So she has been denied bail?
That is unconstitutional.
Her rights are still being infringed.
Well, I think it's probably for her own good.
There's no telling what the family of her late husband will do to her if they get hold of her. It won't be funny at all.
translation.ja: 亡き夫の家族に見つかれば何をされるか分からない

translation.en: But we can secure bail,
keep her in a safe house, somewhere outside of the state.
translation.ja: 州外のシェルターで保護しては？

translation.en: But the conditions of her bail are likely to preclude her from leaving the state.
translation.ja: 夫の殺害容疑がかかってるので

translation.en: After all, she is charged with murdering her husband.
-Tega. -Which is true, but--
-Could I interrupt you for a second? -Yes.
Uh, hi.
Mr. Omale, this is Remi. Remi is my wife and partner.
translation.ja: オマレさん妻でパートナーのレミです

translation.en: Rems, this is Mr. Wilson Omale, the guy in charge of the NGO
translation.ja: こちらはＮＧＯのオマレさんだ アミナの解放に尽力してる

translation.en: that is campaigning for the release of Amina Junaidu.
translation.ja: アミナの解放に尽力してる

translation.en: -Nice to meet you, ma'am. -Okay, nice to meet you.
translation.ja: どうも はじめまして

translation.en: Uh, can I see you real quick? It's important.
-Okay. Excuse me one minute. -Go ahead.
Okay, what's up?
So Mike is here to pick up some of his personal effects,
translation.ja: マイクが私物を取りに来たんだけど

translation.en: and I was wondering if we could incentivize him to stay?
translation.ja: マイクが私物を取りに来たんだけど 引き留めるべき？

translation.en: Uh, look, if you want to keep him, it's fine, okay?
I want us to make him partner.
That is out of the question!
Why? What's wrong with that? How are we going to convince him to stay?
translation.ja: じゃあ引き留められない

translation.en: Look, the man is arrogant, he's-he's-- he's reckless,
translation.ja: あいつは横暴なうえに無鉄砲だ

translation.en: he's ambitious and his loyalty is questionable.
translation.ja: しかも野心の塊で忠誠心が感じられない

translation.en: That man just won one of the most unbeatable cases in Lagos to clinch us that M & G case.
translation.ja: ラゴスで一番難しいＭ＆Ｇの件をまとめたのよ

translation.en: Surely that must count for something in his favor.
Being a partner means he now gets to have a say in how this firm is run.
translation.ja: パートナーになれば経営に口を出してくる

translation.en: And what's so wrong with that? He's a capable lawyer.
translation.ja: 有能なら問題ないでしょ

translation.en: Okay, look. To be a partner is much more than winning cases.
translation.ja: パートナーは勝率が高いだけじゃダメだ

translation.en: Okay? It means he gets to decide the kind of cases that we take.
translation.ja: あいつに案件の選定を任せられるか？

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. Mike doesn't want any of your pro bono cases.
translation.ja: 大丈夫彼はプロボノはやらない

translation.en: Rems, I'm not the one on trial here, okay?
translation.ja: レミ 私に当たるな

translation.en: If you want Mike to stay, it's fine.
But he stays only as an associate. Period.
translation.ja: ただしアソシエイトとしてだ

translation.en: Okay?
[man] Hey, baby.
What are you doing here? Is something wrong with Chisara?
translation.ja: チザラに何かあったの？

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Uh, I dropped her off at school.
translation.ja: いいや　学校に送ってきた

translation.en: I just need to use your Internet.
What happened to the Internet at home?
Out of data.
Nnamdi, I just loaded 50 gigs last month.
translation.ja: 先月は50ギガしか使ってない

translation.en: What do you want me to say, huh? My research this month has been really heavy.
translation.ja: 今月は調査が大変なんだよ

translation.en: I'm way overdue. Honestly, I have to catch up.
translation.ja: 遅れを取り戻さなきゃ

translation.en: Okay. If you want to use the Internet here, then you're gonna have to go in the reception or in the canteen.
translation.ja: ネットを使うなら待合室か食堂へ行って

translation.en: What about the office?
I might have clients coming in and out.
Look, I don't know what you want me to do. If you want to use the Internet here, then you're gonna have to manage the inconveniences.
translation.ja: 面倒なことになるし私まで恥をかくわ

translation.en: It's bad enough that my husband is freeloading off office resources.
translation.ja: 夫が会社の回線をタダ乗りするなんて

translation.en: I'm going to ask you one more time to please reconsider.
translation.ja: お願いだからもう一度 考え直して

translation.en: Do you have a counteroffer for me?
I'm afraid not, but I can promise you
translation.ja: ないけど保障する キャッスル＆キャッスルでの時間は無駄にならない

translation.en: that a few more years at Castle & Castle will not be a waste of your time.
translation.ja: キャッスル＆キャッスルでの時間は無駄にならない

translation.en: Do you know the problem with Castle & Castle?
The clue is in the name.
This... firm is a two-headed monster.
translation.ja: まるで２つ頭のモンスターだ

translation.en: One head wants to go one way, the other wants to go the other way. The body doesn't stand a chance.
translation.ja: 頭の向きが そろわないから体にツケが回ってくる

translation.en: You and I have always been on the same frequency.
translation.ja: 私たちは波長が合うわよね

translation.en: We think alike.
Tega and I on the other hand are more like...
Oil and water?
[chuckles] I was gonna say fire and water.
He's holding all of us back with this pro bono tangent.
translation.ja: ご主人はプロボノに傾倒しすぎだ

translation.en: He's going to run this firm down.
And that's why I need you here on my side,
translation.ja: だから あなたが必要なの

translation.en: by my side, so we don't just go off track.
translation.ja: 私の味方になって一緒に軌道修正してほしい

translation.en: Remi, you're asking me to wait.
Yes.
It will break my heart if you go.
[sighs] Mine too.
I'm only telling you this as a professional courtesy.
translation.ja: 礼儀として伝えますけど

translation.en: But M & G has made it clear. After this case, wherever I go, they follow.
translation.ja: Ｍ＆Ｇは今後 私のところに依頼するそうですよ

translation.en: What?
M & G's our client. That's our account!
Not anymore it seems.
What?
-[phone beeps] -Stella.
Get me M & G, Incorporated. I want to speak to Chief Yekini now.
translation.ja: Ｍ＆Ｇのイエキニにつないで

translation.en: Yes, ma.
-Uh, hello, ma? -Yes?
Sorry, ma, but Chief Yekini is not on seat.
translation.ja: 今は席を外してるそうです

translation.en: Then where the hell is he?
Okay, tell Captain that he should find him.
translation.ja: キャプテンに何が何でも探すよう伝えて

translation.en: -I don't care how he does it. -Yes, ma.
translation.ja: キャプテンに何が何でも探すよう伝えて 了解

translation.en: Captain, that's what happened, though. And you know me now.
translation.ja: キャプテン そういうことよ

translation.en: I work-- Mmm.
Captain. What are you still doing here?
[in Pidgin] Sorry, ma. I'm on my way.
Um, excuse me, ma, these are the corpers that are doing their primary assignment here.
translation.ja: ボス 青年奉仕団が来てますよ

translation.en: Today is their orientation, so I wanted them to meet you.
Now is not the time for that. Let the orientation team deal with that.
translation.ja: 今は それどころじゃない

translation.en: What about Tega? Is he back from his meeting?
Um, yes, I think the meeting's done.
Ah, Mr. Monday. Good morning.
translation.ja: マンデイさんおはようございます

translation.en: -Good morning. -Mmm.
I think that I might have a solution to your filing room problem.
translation.ja: 資料室の件解決案を思いついたわ

translation.en: How can you help?
-Corpers. -Good morning, sir.
[Stella] Meet Mr. Monday.
He is a very, very important man in the firm.
translation.ja: この事務所で絶大な影響力を持つ方よ

translation.en: Yes, this is... Shola? Yes, okay, from ABU.
translation.ja: 彼女はアフマド･ベロ大卒のショラ

translation.en: This is Chidi from Unimaid, and this is Haruna from Abuja.
translation.ja: マイドゥグリのチディにアブジャのハルナ

translation.en: Yes, they are working here for their primary assignments.
Oh. Welcome to Castle & Castle.
translation.ja: ボランティア初日よ よく来たね

translation.en: -Thank you, sir. -Very good.
translation.ja: 光栄です それじゃマンデイさんの指示に従って

translation.en: Yeah, so Mr. Monday here will take you through.
translation.ja: それじゃマンデイさんの指示に従って

translation.en: I'm sure he already has a few things for you to do.
Eh? And remember, we are only retaining one of you after your service here.
translation.ja: 雇用するのは３人のうち１人だけよ

translation.en: So work hard, be dedicated,
translation.ja: 必死に働いてやる気を見せてちょうだい

translation.en: impress me, and you know, you never know what will happen.
translation.ja: 必死に働いてやる気を見せてちょうだい 先のことは分からないけど

translation.en: Mr. Monday, over to you.
All right. Um, here at Castle & Castle,
translation.ja: キャッスル＆キャッスルで―

translation.en: you will have the privilege of rubbing minds with one of the best legal minds in the country.
translation.ja: 一流弁護士から法的思考を学べるとは幸運な若者たちだ

translation.en: Oh, you mean Professor Castle? We can't wait.
translation.ja: あなたがキャッスル教授？

translation.en: I am referring to
the Honorable Monday Esegbuyota Anidi McDonald, Esq. III.
translation.ja: マンデイ･エセブヨタ･アニディ･マクドナルド三世

translation.en: Who's he?
He... is me.
"Incabula" simulacrum.
As I was saying, before I was rudely interrupted...
translation.ja: 先ほど言おうとしたのは…

translation.en: [Remi] We have a crisis-o.
-I'm listening. -If Mike leaves, M & G leaves with him.
translation.ja: 何が マイクがＭ＆Ｇを奪った

translation.en: -And who told you this? -Mike himself.
Oh, surely he's bluffing.
He's just trying to squeeze us so we can give into his demands.
translation.ja: 要求を通すために脅しただけさ

translation.en: And what if he's not? M & G is our anchor account.
translation.ja: 事実なら得意客を失う

translation.en: Then we call Chief Yekini and confront him.
I already did that. He's off the radar.
Yes, hello? Captain, any news?
[Captain] Yes, ma. Yes, ma.
translation.ja: ええ ありましたよ

translation.en: [in Pidgin] My nephew said Chief Yekini is currently at Ikoyi Golf Club.
translation.ja: 〈イエキニ所長はイコイイーで―〉 〈ゴルフ中です〉

translation.en: Yes, ma. Yes, ma. [in Pidgin] He's playing golf.
-Yes, ma. -Oh, okay. Thank you.
translation.ja: はい 了解　ありがとう

translation.en: -Yes? -He's at the golf course.
So let's go.
Okay, but what if we piss him off?
Do you have any better ideas? Come on, Rems, let's go. Let's go confront him.
translation.ja: 他にいい案が？とにかく会って話そう

translation.en: Rems, it's the best thing to do right now.
-Honestly, how can Mike do this? -I don't know.
translation.ja: マイクのせいよ どんな汚い手を使ったんだか

translation.en: He's just an ambitious prick.
translation.ja: どんな汚い手を使ったんだか

translation.en: This is our filing and archive room,
the brain and nerve center of this glorious firm.
Like Sir Ahmadu Bello once said--
translation.ja: アフマド･ベロを知ってるか？

translation.en: -You know Sir Ahmadu Bello? -Yes, sir.
translation.ja: アフマド･ベロを知ってるか？ はい

translation.en: The onetime prime minister of this esteemed country and the Sardauna of Sokoto.
translation.ja: 北部州政府首相であり世継王子だった

translation.en: He said, "Knowledge is power."
A lawyer with no knowledge is like a gun with no bullets.
translation.ja: 知のない弁護士は弾のない銃と同じ

translation.en: So this is where all our knowledge is deposited.
translation.ja: この部屋は知識の保管庫だ

translation.en: Sorry, sir, I have a question. What happened here?
That is none of your concern, hmm?
Your assignment moving forward is to return this room to its former glory.
translation.ja: 君らの使命はここを復元することだ

translation.en: Your job is to put back all the files, volumes, transcripts
translation.ja: ファイルや書物複写物をすべて整理して

translation.en: in their allocated shelves and boxes. Hmm?
translation.ja: 所定の棚や箱に戻してくれ

translation.en: This will show you where everything needs to be.
translation.ja: 必要な情報はこれに明記してある

translation.en: Don't let me down.
translation.ja: 失望させないでくれよ

translation.en: More importantly, don't let Castle & Castle down.
translation.ja: 失望させないでくれよ 私も この会社も

translation.en: Corpers, shun!
Well, you guys know this is exploitation, right?
translation.ja: これ 労働搾取だよな

translation.en: Can we sue them?
-What are you doing? -You heard them, right?
translation.ja: 何すんの 残れるのは１人よ

translation.en: Only one of us will be retained.
Both of you can keep talking. Me, I'm here to work. Abeg.
translation.ja: 私はここで働きたいの

translation.en: Ah! What are you doing? Give me these papers.
translation.ja: やてめてよ　返して

translation.en: -Let it go! Let it go! -Give it to me.
translation.ja: おい 離せ 私のよ

translation.en: Listen to this.
One, two, sing.
Now, look at this.
The young man in that video is brother Demola Fagbohun.
translation.ja: 真ん中の男はデモラ･ファグボフン

translation.en: He now calls himself Dehido.
-A brother that was Spirit-filled. -Spirit-filled.
translation.ja: 神聖な魂を持ってた そうよ

translation.en: [reverend] He was a member of the church choir.
Look at the song and just listen to it.
He took a song that is inspired by the Spirit,
translation.ja: これは聖霊が授けた曲だ

translation.en: -that is so Spirit-filled-- -Spirit-filled! ...to something that is immoral.
translation.ja: その清き魂をこいつは汚した

translation.en: -Something that is demonic. -Demonic.
Satanic principality and defiled song!
translation.ja: これは― 悪魔が宿った卑しい曲だ

translation.en: -Something that is filled with lust. -[scoffs]
But, sir, this is currently the number one song in the nation.
translation.ja: ですが… ナイジェリアで今一番人気の曲ですよ

translation.en: -For seven weeks now. -[together] In hell.
Ah, so, you're contesting the rights to exploit the song?
translation.ja: つまり楽曲の違法使用で訴えを起こしたいと？

translation.en: Yes.
Okay. Uh, if I may ask, who exactly composed the song?
translation.ja: なるほど では この曲の作曲者は？

translation.en: The choir.
Led by sister Nkiru Onuegbu and sister Nkechi Onuwa.
translation.ja: シスター･オヌエグブとシスター･オヌワが監修を

translation.en: Okay. So who does the song belong to?
translation.ja: すると 楽曲の著作権を持ってるのは？

translation.en: The church!
So, no one person is responsible for the song?
translation.ja: ということは特定の権利者はいないんですね

translation.en: Of course there is.
Oh. Who?
-The Holy Spirit! -[women exclaim]
-The Holy Spirit inspired the song. -[exclaiming]
[stuttering] So, the copyright belongs to the Holy Spirit?
translation.ja: つまり この曲の著作権は聖霊にあるということですか

translation.en: Yes!
Okay, but it's going to be hard to get proof of that from the Holy Spirit.
translation.ja: だとしても聖霊から証言を得るのは難しいですよね

translation.en: -Is anything too hard for my God? -[women] Nothing!
translation.ja: 神に不可能は なし

translation.en: Is there anything too hard
translation.ja: 我々の神にできぬことは

translation.en: -for the God that we serve? -Nothing!
translation.ja: 我々の神にできぬことは 皆無

translation.en: -We want to sue brother Demola Fagbohun. -Yes!
translation.ja: デモラ･ファグボフンを訴える

translation.en: -Dehido-- -Dehido.
for copyright infringement.
Devil.
Well, sir, I'm glad to tell you that we'll be taking your case.
translation.ja: 本件ですが喜んで お引き受けします

translation.en: Hallelujah! Glory.
Can you give me a resounding hallelujah?
translation.ja: ともに歌おうじゃないか

translation.en: -Hallelujah! -[chorus] Hallelujah!
Make it a glorious hallelujah!
[Tega] Chief Yekini.
translation.ja: イエキニさん　お見事

translation.en: -That was a good stroke. -Hey.
translation.ja: イエキニさん　お見事 やあ

translation.en: Prof and Mrs. Castle.
Sorry to interrupt your golfing.
Well, you have to be. This is where I come to escape business.
translation.ja: まあね　仕事から逃れたくてここに来たんだ

translation.en: Well, it's a matter of urgency, sir.
Yes. Chief, as you know, your company and our firm,
translation.ja: この２年間お互いにメリットを―

translation.en: we've enjoyed two years of mutually beneficial relationship.
translation.ja: この２年間お互いにメリットを― 享受してきましたよね

translation.en: And thanks to us, very soon another 200 million will be entering your account.
translation.ja: 我々の努力によってもうすぐ２億が手に入る

translation.en: Yeah, and a little bit of that percentage will go to you two.
translation.ja: 一部は お二人の懐に

translation.en: -Well, yes. -Yes, Chief.
translation.ja: ええ 念のため確認したいんですが

translation.en: We just want to be assured of your continued relationship.
translation.ja: 念のため確認したいんですが

translation.en: That come rain or shine, you will be with us as we have stuck with you.
translation.ja: 何があっても関係は変わりませんよね

translation.en: What is this thing all about?
Mike Amenechi is leaving our firm,
and he hinted that M & G will be following where he goes, so...
translation.ja: “Ｍ＆Ｇは自分を選ぶ”とほのめかしたから…

translation.en: Amenechi is a damn good lawyer.
We know, sir, but
translation.ja: そうですが彼が勝ち続けられたのは

translation.en: if you look at his ability to be a good lawyer or win any cases,
translation.ja: そうですが彼が勝ち続けられたのは 事務所の後ろ盾があったからです

translation.en: it's because he's a part of Castle & Castle.
translation.ja: 事務所の後ろ盾があったからです

translation.en: -Yes. -Mike begs to differ.
Well, what Mike thinks is inconsequential here.
translation.ja: マイクの意見はともかく

translation.en: The question is, what do you think? And with whom will you pitch your tent?
translation.ja: 重要なのはあなたがどちらを選ぶかです

translation.en: [Stella] He's not bad.
[Captain] No, no, no, no.
What are you doing?
What is-- It's none of your business, Captain.
Who is looking for love?
I said it is none of your business, Captain.
translation.ja: 干渉しないでちょうだい

translation.en: Why should you be looking for something in Sokoto when it's already in your sokoto?
translation.ja: もうソコトにいるのになぜ探す

translation.en: What-What is in my sokoto? Captain, please, I don't--
translation.ja: いるって誰が？どういうこと？

translation.en: Nothing, nothing, nothing. It's none of my business.
translation.ja: 何でもない　忘れろ

translation.en: It's none of my business.
Come on, Captain. Is there something that you know that I don't know?
translation.ja: 私に何か隠してることが？

translation.en: -[elevator bell dings] -Just tell me. I don't like--
Move it! Damn!
-Damn Betty! [mutters] -[Dehido sighs]
So y'all want to sue Dehido's ass, and you still want to be taking selfies?
translation.ja: 訴えといて写真を撮んのか？

translation.en: Damn!
Who? Us? Are we the ones suing you?
translation.ja: 私たちがあなたを訴える？

translation.en: Who-- In this place? Who can sue you?
translation.ja: 超人気セレブのあなたのことを？

translation.en: A celebrity like you? Who can sue you?
translation.ja: 超人気セレブのあなたのことを？ そんなことする人間にはろくな未来が待ってない

translation.en: Listen, the person that tries to sue you, I say it will not be better for their life.
translation.ja: そんなことする人間にはろくな未来が待ってない

translation.en: The blood of Je-- [clears throat]
Mr. Dehido, so glad you--
So glad you could join us on such short notice. Um, please, the board room is...
translation.ja: 急に呼び出してすみません会議室は…

translation.en: this way.
So you want God to punish our clients, huh?
Where do you think your salary comes from?
How can you sue me for a song that is mine?
-You did not write the song. -No!
The Spirit did.
Through me! He gave me utterance. I was the person that the Spirit used.
translation.ja: 俺の体に宿って御言葉をくれたんだ

translation.en: And that was because you were a member of the church choir.
translation.ja: 聖歌隊にいた時にだろ

translation.en: The Spirit wouldn't have given you the song if you were singing in a nightclub.
translation.ja: 聖霊の御言葉をナイトクラブで歌うな

translation.en: No!
Demon, demon, demon, demon!
So now you are the only one that knows the ways of the Spirit, yeah? Spirit man.
translation.ja: 聖霊の御業を知るのは自分だけだと？

translation.en: The Spirit gave you that song to edify the people of the Lord.
translation.ja: 聖霊が曲を授けたのは民を教化して…

translation.en: -[women] Edify. -[reverend] To edify the church!
translation.ja: 教化 教会の徳を高め御業を広めるためだ

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: 教会の徳を高め御業を広めるためだ

translation.en: -To promote the work of God. -[women] Promote.
translation.ja: 教会の徳を高め御業を広めるためだ 広めよ

translation.en: And at no time did the Spirit specify when the song shall be sung.
translation.ja: 聖霊はいつ歌えとは言ってない

translation.en: So my client is within his rights to sing the song anytime, anywhere he likes.
translation.ja: つまり依頼人には自由に歌う権利が

translation.en: That is a holy song that your client is using for personal gain!
translation.ja: こいつは神聖な曲で私腹を肥やしてるんだぞ

translation.en: Uh, Pastor.
Your G63 or whatever car you're driving, wasn't it offering money used to buy it?
translation.ja: 自分こそ教会への献金で車を買ったろ

translation.en: Are you not using the money of the church for your personal gain too?
Is that not the offering money? Is that not holy money?
translation.ja: 神聖なる献金なんじゃ？

translation.en: He called me pastor! You used to call me Papa!
You called me pastor!
-Everyone, please, calm down. -I ain't no boy.
-I ain't no boy. I ain't no boy. -Please, calm down.
translation.ja: ガキ扱いするな 静かに

translation.en: -Mr. Dehido-- -I ain't no boy.
May I remind you that our client is not the one being sued here? You are.
translation.ja: 分かってます？ 訴えられてるのはあなたですよ

translation.en: [scoffs] Whatever.
-Thank you, my beloved. -Please, everyone.
translation.ja: どうも 冷静になってください

translation.en: Calm down.
translation.ja: 冷静になってください

translation.en: If this case goes to court,
because of the subjectivity attached, it will lead to long, endless hours,
translation.ja: 主観が絡んでくるから裁判はかなり長引く

translation.en: which would mean a lot of time and money for both parties.
translation.ja: お互い時間もお金もかかる

translation.en: It is our recommendation that we can come to a mutually beneficial resolution.
translation.ja: 代わりに 両者の利益になる解決案を提案しても？

translation.en: So what do you recommend, my daughter?
That a percentage of the song's earnings be paid back to the church.
translation.ja: 曲の売上の一部を教会に

translation.en: [in Yoruba] That cannot work!
That won't work! That can't work!
Mr. Dehido, you concede that the inspiration for the song
translation.ja: ダヒドさん曲の着想を得たのは

translation.en: did come about on church grounds while you were a member of the choir.
translation.ja: 聖歌隊にいた時ですよね

translation.en: Yes, and so?
And since Mr. Dehido concedes that the Spirit did reveal the song to him on church ground,
translation.ja: 聖霊があなたに曲を授けたのは教会の敷地

translation.en: it is appropriate that the percentage paid back to the church is ten percent of the song's earnings...
translation.ja: ならば売上の10％を教会に還元すべきです

translation.en: which he will supplement with a free performance
translation.ja: さらに当該曲の神聖バージョンを

translation.en: of the holy version of that same song at church this coming Sunday.
translation.ja: さらに当該曲の神聖バージョンを 日曜に教会で歌うこと

translation.en: Why?
And how is that beneficial?
Pastor-- I mean, Reverend.
If news about Mr. Dehido's performance was to spread,
translation.ja: ダヒド氏のパフォーマンスが世間で評判になれば

translation.en: think of what it would do to Sunday service attendance.
translation.ja: 日曜礼拝の参加者が増える

translation.en: Not to mention your offering collection.
So Pastor might just be inclined to drop the lawsuit.
translation.ja: この条件なら 牧師は訴えを取り下げてもよさそうですね

translation.en: That's not a bad idea.
translation.ja: まあ 悪い案ではなさそうだな

translation.en: We can work with that. We can work with that.
Even in the chambers!
The Spirit has inspired.
-The Spirit has recommended. -Yes!
translation.ja: 啓示をくださった 神よ

translation.en: Thank you.
Yes, Lord.
Oh, Jesus...
You should invite her for the singles program--
translation.ja: 彼女を独身プログラムに招待して

translation.en: O Lord, Where Is My Man?
-You need to be there. -Where is he?
translation.ja: 来たまえ 教会で相手が見つかるわ

translation.en: -Hallelujah. -Find him at our church.
translation.ja: 教会で相手が見つかるわ

translation.en: -Wednesday and Thursday. -Wednesday and Thursday.
[Stella] Bye!
[Nneka] That was short and painless.
Short and painless translates to no money for the firm.
translation.ja: 会社の利益はゼロだがな

translation.en: -[Tega] Hi, Stella. How's it going? -Welcome back.
Hey, guys. Please, can I have your attention, please?
translation.ja: みんなちょっと集まってくれ

translation.en: Everyone, your attention, please.
I'm afraid we have some news.
Effective today, Mike Amenechi is no longer an associate of this firm.
translation.ja: 本日付けでマイクはここを去る

translation.en: That can't be right. Mike just won a big case for the firm.
translation.ja: 大型案件をまとめたばかりなのに

translation.en: Yes, it's, uh, his decision. He feels that it is time to move on.
translation.ja: 本人が次のステップに進みたいと

translation.en: And the major crisis is the fact that M & G Holdings,
translation.ja: さらにマズいことにうちの最大の顧客である―

translation.en: who happens to be our anchor client and our biggest account, have dropped us.
translation.ja: さらにマズいことにうちの最大の顧客である― Ｍ＆Ｇホールディングスを引き抜いていった

translation.en: They've gone with Mike.
translation.ja: Ｍ＆Ｇホールディングスを引き抜いていった

translation.en: So, tough times ahead. People, we're going to have to tighten our belts around here.
translation.ja: 今後は厳しくなるから経費節減に努めて

translation.en: [Tega] The profit from the M & G case should tide us over for a while.
translation.ja: Ｍ＆Ｇの報酬金で当面はしのげる

translation.en: We just need to hit the hours hard, you know?
translation.ja: だが早急に何とかしないと

translation.en: Why is it always from frying pan to fire with the two of you?
translation.ja: 一難去って また一難か２人ともいい加減にしろ

translation.en: First, you lost your top lawyer. And now your top client.
translation.ja: トップ弁護士と大口顧客を失った？

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Were you cursed? -Dad.
-Yeah? -How did you know?
I know everything. I see everything, I hear everything.
translation.ja: あらゆる情報を網羅してると言ったろ

translation.en: Yesterday, we were here celebrating. Today, we are here mourning. Eh?
translation.ja: 昨日は祝賀ムードで今日は葬式ムードか

translation.en: Well, things seem to change pretty fast around here.
translation.ja: ここは変化が激しいの

translation.en: Well, I hope you are happy now.
Oh, please, with all due respect, what does that have to do with me?
translation.ja: 失礼ですが 私が何か

translation.en: See? You see?
Abdicating responsibility, as always.
translation.ja: いつも責任を放棄する

translation.en: Just as you did when you made her pregnant out of wedlock!
translation.ja: 未婚の娘を妊娠させた時も

translation.en: -Dad! Please, now is not the time. -Yes?
Rems, let him. Let him get it off his chest.
translation.ja: 本音を言ってもらおう

translation.en: Let him say his piece.
-Fine. -As far as your father is concerned, I'm the source of all your misfortunes.
translation.ja: 私が不幸の元凶なんでしょう

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Look here!
Left to him, you would be a single mother now. Huh? And a law school dropout.
translation.ja: 彼に任せてたら学校も辞めてシングルマザーになってた

translation.en: How? I married her.
-You did? -Yes, I did. She is Mrs. Castle.
translation.ja: そう？ 私の妻でしょう

translation.en: And she's my daughter.
You think I'm going to stand here and watch you drag her down again? Not ever!
translation.ja: 娘の足を引っ張るのをこれ以上 見てられん

translation.en: Stop, please!
Rems...
-[Duke] Huh? -I can't do this.
Not ever! Eh?
-Really, Dad? -Did you see that?
-Really? -Huh? Tell me!
Tell me I am wrong. Tell me, Remi, that I am wrong.
translation.ja: 間違ってるのは私のほうなのか？

translation.en: You saw that.
Mr. Omale.
It's Tega Castle here.
I'll take the case.
Yes, I'll do it.
Oh, Stella.
Madam?
I was going and I saw you...
translation.ja: さっき見えたんですけど…

translation.en: [clears throat] You know, I have an extra bottle of...
translation.ja: 多めに持ってきたんでこれ どうぞ

translation.en: Thanks.
-Ah. -I would've drank it, but, you know.
-Oh, my God. Is this gin or ginger? -Sorry.
translation.ja: 何これジン？　ジンジャー？

translation.en: It's just gin-- Well, it's just ginger
translation.ja: ジン… ジャーですよ

translation.en: with a little bit of my special ingredient. [laughs]
translation.ja: 隠し味が入ってるけど

translation.en: -It's good. -Mmm.
It's really good. Thank you.
You're welcome.
Um, so, ma, are we in trouble?
translation.ja: ボス うちの状況は？

translation.en: [in Pidgin] What's all this "ma, ma, ma"?
Just drop the formality.
Sorry, sorry. Sorry, it's just that-- See, be careful what you ask for.
translation.ja: すいませんでも本当にいいんですか？

translation.en: 'Cause I know what those FGGC girls used to call you. I will just...
translation.ja: 女子大時代のあだ名で呼びますよ

translation.en: [laughs] Well, don't forget, I'm still the boss.
translation.ja: 上司なのは忘れないで

translation.en: You are. You are, you're still the boss, and you're doing an amazing job.
translation.ja: もちろんですよ私の理想の上司ですもん

translation.en: -[sighs] -Honestly.
I don't know if amazing is gonna cut it anymore.
translation.ja: もう理想じゃないかも

translation.en: How bad is it? Tell me.
Do you remember my fourth year in law school?
translation.ja: ロースクールの４年目を？

translation.en: Wasn't that, um, when you found out you were pregnant with Ben?
translation.ja: ベンを妊娠した時のこと？

translation.en: Yes.
And I was this close to getting rid of him.
translation.ja: もう少しで中絶するとこだった

translation.en: But you didn't, thank God.
Yeah. Thank God indeed.
But you know that feeling of helplessness and not knowing what to do?
translation.ja: だけど先が見えなくて無力感にさいなまれた

translation.en: I'm feeling that same feeling now.
Ben arrives tomorrow morning.
translation.ja: 明日 ベンが来るの

translation.en: His timing could not be worse.
translation.ja: 最悪のタイミングよね

translation.en: You're going to be okay.
You're going to be all right, I promise.
translation.ja: 絶対 乗り越えられます
